Copyright ? 1999 CERN - European Organization for Nuclear Research. This code is adapted from COLT 1.2; Eigendecomposition now throws an ArithmeticException if calculations do not converge within 'maxIterations'

Author:
Marc A. Suchard

Constructor Detail

RobustEigenDecomposition

public RobustEigenDecomposition(cern.colt.matrix.DoubleMatrix2D A)
                         throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
Constructs and returns a new eigenvalue decomposition object; The decomposed matrices can be retrieved via instance methods of the returned decomposition object. Checks for symmetry, then constructs the eigenvalue decomposition.

Parameters:
A - A square matrix.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if A is not square.
java.lang.ArithmeticException

RobustEigenDecomposition

                         throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
Throws:
java.lang.ArithmeticException
